#account_key.title: Account Key
#account_key.description: Account Key will be used over SAS Token if both credentials are provided. Please leave Account Key empty if you are not provided one.

destination_path.title: Destination Path
destination_path.description: The folder path you want to export the files to. Backslash '/' needs to be included into the configuration. If you want to export into the root folder of the container, please leave this blank. Example: to export into folder [test], enter 'test/'

append_date_to_file.title: Append Date to File
append_date_to_file.description: Today's date (YYYY_MM_dd) will be appended into the export file
